item.title: About
item.description: Simple is too mainstream, normal is too wierd. Let’s complicate things like no one has done before. Let’s tinker with stability. Let’s fix everything that isn’t broken. Wouldn’t want to make things too easy now, would we? Stick around.

item.title: My Tenth Post Using a Cloud Server
item.description: Ok so I am trying to get this to run using a remote server. Looks fine I guess.

item.title: The Ninth Post Image Test
item.description:
So in this post, I am going to try and add an image. I know this sounds silly but I need to understand what I am doing here. This isn’t as straightforward as Wordpress you know.

You’ll need to click this post in order to see the image.

item.title: My Eighth Test
item.description: I can’t possibly call this a post anymore. This is just a test.

item.title: My Seventh Post
item.description: I think I have spammed a lot to this website. Let’s give it a rest.

item.title: My Sixth Post
item.description: I guess I still don’t understand Git really well.

item.title: My Fifth Post
item.description: I guess I am getting the hang of it now. Git is something great and this is a great opportunity to understand and appreciate how well it works. Looking forward to my adventures now.

item.title: The fourth post
item.description: So this is the fourth post on the site and I am still learning new stuff. Wordpress was easier for sure but this is more efficient in the long run, I guess.

item.title: My Third Post
item.description: Still testing. Lots of new stuff to learn here.

item.title: Second Test
item.description: This is a second test. I have deployed the website and it seems like it’s good to go!

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first post. Let the experiment begin!
